name: gunbloem
description:
gunbloem is an action-packed third person shooter gun planting breeding crafting game. Plant seeds and use their fruits to craft guns, or risk gun parts to breed superior parts, all whilst defending yourself from hordes of enemies!

Features

  • Simple, pick-up-and-play controls!
  • An intuitive crafting system!
  • 12 different gun parts!
  • 6 types of enemies!
  • An endless amount of guns to create!
  • Plenty of opportunity to break the game!

Credits

  • Axi - Game Design, Development
  • kiwiwii - Concept Art, Sound, UI Art
  • Luukii - Concept Art, Character Art
  • quintvld - Environment Art, Character Art
  • Wond3rfool - Development

Inspired by sokpop!
